meanings.definition: Difficult to move or handle due to being bulky or unwieldy.
meanings.sent1: The baulkiest suitcase was a struggle to lift onto the overhead compartment.
meanings.sent2: The baulkiest furniture in the room was the large oak wardrobe.
meanings.sent3: Trying to fit the baulkiest chair through the narrow doorway was quite a challenge.
meanings.sent4: The baulkiest package felt like trying to carry a mountain on your back.
meanings.sent5: The baulkiest object in the room seemed to defy all attempts at easy movement.

meanings.sent1: She was the baulkiest team member, always resisting new ideas.
meanings.sent2: The baulkiest student in the class refused to participate in group activities.
meanings.sent3: The baulkiest cat refused to come down from the tree no matter how much coaxing.
meanings.sent4: His baulkiest attitude made it difficult to work together on the project.
meanings.sent5: Dealing with the baulkiest customer required a lot of patience and understanding.

meanings.sent1: The baulkiest dog hesitated before entering the unfamiliar room.
meanings.sent2: She gave the baulkiest response when asked to share her opinion.
meanings.sent3: The baulkiest child took a long time to warm up to the new babysitter.
meanings.sent4: His baulkiest reaction to the surprise party was unexpected.
meanings.sent5: The baulkiest actor seemed unsure of his lines during the performance.
